div.p: Example value set for Condition (Problem/Diagnosis) Categories
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category

tr.td: The patient considers the condition an issue to be addressed
A symptom of a condition (as might be mentioned in a review of systems)
An observation made by a healthcare provider
This is a judgment made by a healthcare provider that the patient has a particular disease or condition
